definitions.definition: A coin worth one-tenth of a U.S. dollar.
A coin worth one-tenth of a Canadian dollar.
A playing card with the rank of ten
A measurement of illicit drugs (usually marijuana) sold in ten dollar bags.

definitions.example: Are you traveling on the company's dime?

definitions.definition: A beautiful woman (10 on a 10-point scale)
A defensive formation with six defensive backs, one of whom is a dimeback.
(with "on") To inform on, to turn in to the authorities, to rat on, especially anonymously.
definitions.example: Somebody dimed on me and I got arrested for selling marijuana.

definitions.definition: To operate an audio amplifier (especially an electric guitar amplifier) at level "10" (typically the highest amplification level).
definitions.example: I get the best-sounding sustain and smooth harmonic distortion when I run the amp dimed.
